amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for DOE fossil energy research and development activities by $142 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding in the Fossil Energy Research and Development account by $142 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kline (MN) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 303 (Roll no. 511).
